Language.Text: (cat "Rama pauses for a long time, and when he speaks it is in a whisper. " "\"When I became a man, I went to see a monk about my future. " "He told me that I was destined to die on a journey to the Core.\"" " And then, Rama laughs and dispatches the rest of his drink. " "\"But I no longer fear my destiny. I will go with you\"" )
(cat "As you get up to leave, Rama grabs your arm and says, " "\"Perhaps we will see each other again.\"" )

Events.GetGlobalAchievements:
(block (theList status) (setq status (typGetGlobalData &scCenturionRama; "status"))
(if status (setq theList (list (list (switch (eq status 'joined) "Joined by Rama" (eq status 'declined) "Declined Rama's company" (eq status 'destroyed) "Allowed Rama to meet his destiny" (eq status 'destroyedByPlayer) "Killed Rama" (eq status 'returnedHome) "Joined by Rama" (cat "ERROR: Rama status: " status) ) Nil "achievements & regrets" ) )) )
theList )
